text: Mystify may refer to: ==In Film== * Mystify: Michael Hutchence, a 2019 documentary about the life of Michael Hutchence, lead singer of INXS. ==In Music== * Mystify: A Musical Journey with Michael Hutchence, a 2019 album by Michael Hutchence. * "Mystify" (song), 1989 single by INXS * "Mystify" (Saving Abel song), a 2013 single ==See also== * Mystification (disambiguation) * Mysticism
title: Mystify
